mapper.sql: id, model_id, dim_id, formula, status, create_time, update_time, creator
mapper.insert: insert into dim_model (id, model_id, dim_id, formula, status, create_time, update_time, creator) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{dimId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{formula,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into dim_model
id,
model_id,
dim_id,
formula,
status,
create_time,
update_time,
creator,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{dimId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{formula,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update dim_model
model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
dim_id = #{dimId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
formula = #{formula,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dim_model set model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, dim_id = #{dimId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, formula = #{formula,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creator = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into dim_model ( model_id, dim_id, formula, creator) values
( #{dimModel.modelId}, #{dimModel.dimId}, #{dimModel.formula}, #{dimModel.creator} )
mapper.select: select from dim_model where model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and status = 1

select t1.id as dimModelId, t1.dim_id as dimId, t1.model_id as modelId, t1.formula as formula, t2.dim_code as dimCode, t2.dim_name as dimName, t2.dim_comment as dimComment from dim_model t1 left join dim t2 on t1.dim_id = t2.id where t1.status = 1 and t2.status = 1 and t1.model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select t1.id as dimModelId, t1.model_id as modelId, t1.dim_id as dimId, t1.formula, t3.dim_code as dimCode, t3.dim_name as dimName, t3.dim_comment as dimComment from dim_model t1 left join app_model_relation t2 on t1.model_id = t2.model_id left join dim t3 on t1.dim_id = t3.id where t2.status = 1 and t1.status = 1 and t3.status = 1 and t2.app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and t1.dim_id = #{dimId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
